Sure! Here is a recommendation for a pierogi-making cooking class in Pomerania:

1. Polish Cuisine Gdansk offers a 3-hour pierogi workshop where you can learn how to make pierogi from scratch, including preparing the dough, filling, and shaping techniques. The workshop includes an introduction to traditional Polish cooking and a tasting of the pierogi you've made afterward. 

The classes are conducted in English and cost around 150 PLN per person. You can book the workshop through their website or by contacting them directly. 

In addition to Polish Cuisine Gdansk, the other resources listed above may also offer classes on pierogi-making or traditional Pomeranian cuisine, so be sure to check them out as well.
